entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
